name: Gun Cubes
description:
First person endless rogue like shooter.

It's an endless game, enemies will continue to scale infinitely. You can gather items that will increase your power as well.

The entire game is essentially a remake of my only 2D game I've ever made (it's not on itch.io).

All models expect the "Swamp Eagle" were made during the jam.

Created during the 7DFPS Game Jam 2022
